receiveChatMessage(String, String, String, String, boolean, boolean) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameManager
User has either requested to see messages (fromUser,message,toUser are null), or add message and get chat messages (gameId, null, fromUser, null, true, inGame) -> receive all the messages (gameId, null, fromUser, null, false, inGame) -> receive last 5 messages (gameID, recipient, fromUser, message, false, inGame) -> send message and receive last 5 messages
